title: VRMMO Gakuen de Tanoshii Makaizou no Susume: Saijaku Job de Saikyou Damage Dashitemita
original_name: VRMMO 学園で楽しい魔改造のススメ～最弱ジョブで最強ダメージ出してみた～
sinopse:
Imagine a school that teaches you how to play games! On top of that, imagine learning on the first day of class that your long-time raiding buddy is actually a girl!

(Source: Sol Press)
